edu.rit.m2mi.test
Class Pong

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.rit.m2mi.test.Pong
All Implemented Interfaces:
PingPong
public class Pong
extends Object
implements PingPong

Class Pong is a main program for testing M2MI. It creates and exports an object that implements interface PingPong which ignores pings and processes pongs. The program runs forever or until killed. After running the Ping program in one process and the Pong program in another process, run the StartPingPong program in a third process to kick things off.

Usage: java edu.rit.m2mi.test.Pong

M2MI Library Version 02-Jul-2002

pong

public void pong(int i)
Do a pong. Print "Pong i", wait one second, and call ping(i+1).
